title: Best boozy advent calendars 2019: Gin, beer, wine and whisky
text:
From wine and beer to gin and whisky, these are the best boozy advent calendars around. [Photo: John Lewis/ Honest Brew]

Yahoo is committed to finding you the best products at the best prices. We may receive a share from purchases made via links on this page.

Although there are numerous adult-appropriate advent calendars up for grabs in 2019, from luxury beauty to 24 types of cheese, many have their eyes on another common favourite: booze.

Whether you’re a gin lover, red wine enthusiast or whisky connoisseur, you can spend the Christmas countdown drinking your tipple of your choice.

From calendars bursting with craft beer from 14 countries, or a luxurious Fever Tree-filled gin and tonic treat - there are multiple worthy options to choose from this year.

READ MORE: Best beauty advent calendars 2019: Jo Malone, Lush, Charlotte Tilbury and The Body Shop

Here are the best boozy advent calendars around for the perfect pre-Christmas treats:

If you love gin...

Fever Tree is a treat for all gin fans, so what better than an advent calendar that is fully stocked? The calendar is filled with 12 50ml bottles of iconic craft gin and specially matched tonic. Available exclusively at Waitrose & Partners.

This is the world’s first all Premium Pink Gin advent calendar, so if you love pink gin, this is the one for you. It’s filled with 12 different branded pink gins, with flavours ranging from rose and jasmine to strawberries and cream and watermelon.

If beer is your thing...

Beer lovers look no further than Honest Brew’s 2019 calendar. It’s filled with 24 beers from nine different countries. It also includes 12 exclusive brews from the hottest breweries around including Boundary, Cloudwater, Pühaste, and Northern Monk.

This year the calendar includes 24 beers from 14 countries, which are worth over £80. There’s no choice limitations either as it includes Mikkeller, Thornbridge, Amundsen, Magic Rock, Wild Beer, Bosteels and many more.
